latest_update.title: 🚀 Auto-Sell & RPP Update
latest_update.description: Major update with auto-sell animals system, automatic RPP commands, and enhanced captcha detection

changes: 💰 Auto Sell Animals System - Automatic sell when cash runs out
🎲 Automatic Run Piku PuP (RPP) - Natural behavior simulation
📊 Improved Web Dashboard - Real-time command logging and toggles
⚙️ Configuration Enhancements - New autoSell and autoRandomCommands sections
🎨 UI/UX Improvements - New status indicators with animations
🛡️ Enhanced Security & Safety - Better anti-detection patterns
🐛 Bug Fixes - Dashboard status updates and stability improvements
Updated ASCII art with MIZU 水 branding
breaking_changes: Renamed main file from uwu.py to mizu.py
Changed color scheme from purple to cyan
